text: Huawei Mate 20, Huawei Mate 20 Pro and Huawei Mate 20 X are smartphones that are developed and made by the chinese technology company Huawei. The smartphone series came out on October 17, 2018. It is use the EMUI 9 operating system, which is based on Android 9 Pie. ==Specifications== ===Hardware=== ====Memory==== * The Huawei Mate 20 has a 4-gigabyte RAM and a 128-gigabyte storage. * The Huawei Mate 20 Pro and the Huawei Mate 20 X have 6-GB RAM and a 128-GB storage. * The Huawei Mate 20 RS Porsche Design has 8-GB RAM and a 256/512-GB storage. ==== Camera ==== * The Huawei Mate 20 has a 12-megapixel Rear Camera wide, an 8-MP Rear Camera telephoto, and a 16-MP Rear ultrawide Camera. * The Huawei Mate 20 Pro has a 40-MP Camera wide, 20-MP Camera ultrawide, and a 8-MP camera telephotos. ==== Battery ==== * The Huawei Mate 20 has a battery size of 4000mAh. * The Huawei Mate 20 Pro has a battery size of 4200mAh. * The Huawei Mate 20 X has a battery size of 5000mAh. ==== Display size ==== * The Huawei Mate 20 has a 6.53 inch display. * The Huawei Mate 20 Pro has a 6.39 inch display. ==== Sound ==== The Huawei Mate 20 Series have a Dolby Atmos loudspeaker, which is used for a louder stereo speaker. ==== Video ==== The Huawei Mate 20 Pro back camera can record video in: * 4K 30 FPS (frames per second) * 1080 pixels 60 FPS * 1080P 30 FPS * 720P 30FPS The front camera is a 24-megapixel Wide, and records video in 1080P 30FPS. The rear camera zoom is five to eight times magnification. The Huawei Mate 20 back camera can record video in: * 4K 30FPS * 1080P 60FPS * 1080P 30FPS * 720P 30FPS The selfie camera is a 24-megapixel wide, and records video in 1080P 30FPS. The rear camera zoom is three to five times magnification. ===Software=== Huawei Mate 20 Series comes with the EMUI 9 operating system based on Android 9 Pie. The global version can be updated to EMUI 12, and the chinese version can be changed to Harmony OS 2.0. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official websites Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2018 Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording Category:Android smartphones Category:Huawei mobile phones
title: Huawei Mate 20
